quote: To truly laugh, you must be able to take your pain, and play with it.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Laughter is involuntary. If it's funny you laugh.
author: Tom Lehrer

quote: Laugh loudly, laugh often, and most important, laugh at yourself.
author: Chelsea Handler,  Lies That Chelsea Handler Told Me

quote: Laugh as much as you breathe and love as long as you live.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Born of Shadows

quote: If you can't do anything about it, laugh like hell.
author: David Cook

quote: I laugh because I must not cry, that is all, that is all.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If we couldn't laugh we would all go insane.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing.
author: Ken Kesey,  One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

quote: We who think we are about to die will laugh at anything.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Night Watch

quote: You can turn painful situations around through laughter. If you can find humor in anything, even poverty, you can survive it.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Laughter is the shortest distance between two people.
author: Victor Borge

quote: Laughter is the divine effervescing.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: When someone tells you somebodyâ€™s been murdered, laughing is probably not the best response. You know, for future reference.But laughing is exactly what I did.
author: Rachel Hawkins,  Hex Hall

quote: Laughter is carbonated holiness.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: never's the word God listens for when he needs a laugh.
author: Stephen King,  The Dark Tower

quote: Laughter is poison to fear.
author: George R.R. Martin,  A Game of Thrones

quote: Learn what is to be taken seriously and laugh at the rest.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: That is the saving grace of humor, if you fail no one is laughing at you.
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: Laughter is the antidote to existential pain
author: S. Spencer Baker,  Slabscape: Reset

quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: Laughter is an instant vacation.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Laughter is the hand of God on the shoulder of a troubled world.
author: Grady Nutt

quote: Laughter is a sunbeam of the soul.
author: Thomas Mann,  The Magic Mountain

quote: Through humor, you can soften some of the worst blows that life delivers. And once you find laughter, no matter how painful your situation might be, you can survive it.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: I can't live without a sense of humor. I need to be laughing and entertained at all times.
author: Carlos Ponce

quote: He who laughs last laughs the laughiest.
author: Louise Rennison,  Dancing in My Nuddy-Pants

quote: Happiness is a big joke; let us laugh at it loud.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Sometimes I make myself laugh, but that's because I appreciate my sense of humor.
author: Regina Hall

quote: If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Laughter and The Chosen [10w] Making people laugh is God's gift to the Chosen People.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: If it gets laughs, it's funny.
author: Rachel Dratch

quote: Laughter is good for both the body and the soul.
author: Mike Meyer

quote: Humor can alter any situation and help us cope at the very instant we are laughing.
author: Allen Klein

quote: I think you learn more if you're laughing at the same time.
author: Mary Ann Shaffer

quote: You have as much laughter as you have faith.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Everyone has a sense of humor. If you don't laugh at jokes, you probably laugh at opinions.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: You can laugh! But people used to believe there were no such things as the Blibbering Humdinger or the Crumple-Horned Snorkack!
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Laughter is the most important paradise of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You learn timing on the road. You learn structure and how to read an audience. You learn so much about the business of laughter that you can't learn on a set, because it's all on you. Sometimes you bomb, and you know not to tell that joke again... You just hope people find the humor in the awkwardness.
author: Marlon Wayans

quote: I have a very silly sense of humor. I've never laughed harder in my entire life than seeing someone with toilet paper stuck on the bottom of their shoe.
author: Paula Poundstone

quote: The best way to make your audience laugh is to start laughing yourself.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: As soon as you have made a thought, laugh at it.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Basically, I think you need two things to get by in this world: a sense of humor and the ability to laugh when your ego is destroyed.
author: Arlo Guthrie

quote: I have seen what a laugh can do. It can transform almost unbearable tears into something bearable, even hopeful.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Some men have actually died from laughing. That's so funny I fear for my own life.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Gags die, humor doesn't.
author: Jack Benny

quote: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.
author: Woody Allen

quote: In Buddhism, they say attachment to anything only leads to suffering. So when we laugh, it's our way of saying, 'I'm unattached to that.' You're tickled by it, it makes your lobes do something on their own. So humor is very important to me. I always take that to the stage first.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Cut out all these exclamation points. An exclamation point is like laughing at your own joke.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
